root.name: Hardline
root.description: Hardline is a cyberpunk themed rail shooter with adventure game elements. Players will take control of Ted Irvine, a rebel in the gritty streets of a war torn future. Law and Order have collapsed, and a mysterious group known as The Sect have taken over, using psychic powers to control the populace.The game includes 10 levels of rail shooting game play, interspersed with point and click sequences and FMV cut scenes.
